extendedInfo.description: Classic SciFi RPG style play. Design your character and warp around a Universe with over 100 systems. If you love SciFi like Star Wars, Star Trek, Serenity, Firefly, Battlestar Galactica, or Babylon 5 you'll probably love Dark Nova!.  Open ended RPG gameplay inspired by classic space games like Elite, Privateer, Star Control, EV Nova, Sundog, Freelancer, Starflight and more! Be a Trader, Pirate, Smuggler, maybe a Bounty Hunter. Build your ship and your skills and follow your destiny! Trek through the stars on quests and adventures. Trade in space and at ports! Encounter mysterious alien races. Transport passengers but beware some may bring unwanted attention to you. Dark Nova is the official conversion of the classic Palm Pilot game Space Trader with new graphical, sound, and gameplay content.***Thanks to everyone who has emailed us with suggestions! We are constantly working to improve the app!Please Visit http://darknova.net and send us your suggestions.Follow @dead_jim on Twitter for Dark Nova updates

reviews.title: Thoroughly enjoyable
reviews.comment: A nice litte space game. Very simple but surprisingly addictive and compelling. No storyline as such but a few funny events and interesting missions. Get it.
reviews.author: Renegade Poi

reviews.title: Frequent crashes
reviews.comment: Enough to block play- im crashing often around day 45ish. You hit that within the first 10ish jumps you do.  Also, game uses permadeath, so why bother even having a save function? Unless it\'s not supposed to use permadeath, in which case, the save function is broken too.
reviews.author: Aric Reid

reviews.title: Crashes while Owner hides
reviews.comment: I started with lite version & choose those over Catan. I regret this now because the full version doesn\'t work very well. I emailed BOTH contacts over three weeks ago....NOTHING! Very disappointed because it likes to crash a lot.
reviews.author: Leigh Bain

reviews.title: Fun...for a few days.
reviews.comment: Good game until you get the best ship and weapons. After that it gets kind of boring. Pretty cool for the first week of playing, though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun.
reviews.comment: I thought $3.99 was more than what I should pay for, though overall the game is pretty interesting & addictive. A little lag and tiny bugs, but nothing too bad to deal with.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s Space Trader-ish, sure
reviews.comment: Taps feel laggy.  UI poorly designed, with buttons at the bottom of the screen covering elements of the System Info screen.  Text messages generated in space travel don\'t clear fast enough,and end up covering my screen for a while after I\'ve arrived in port.  How can a game this simple (no animations, turn-based play) feel so much slower on my Motorola XPRT than its ancestor did on my Handspring Edge?  Cut out all the \"pretty\" junk, and just give me Space Trader!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Good game but crashes so much its frustrating to play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: While a wonderful nostalgia trip for Space Trader fans, this port is kind of lackluster and riddled with slow loading and bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes frequently (on my EVO 3D) or else it would get four, possibly five, stars. Fun, but SAVE YOUR GAME FREQUENTLY!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t progress
reviews.comment: Pirates attack on first turn and follow you, damaging your ship each turn.  Can\'t amass funds to even buy weapons.  Pirates follow you from location to location. Eventually you leave a location with full repairs and just get a single message informing you that you are dead. Thanks. Would have been nice e to know a battle was imminent. Star system buy/sell prices change from the time you view them to the time you arrive; so, then why even provide that info in advance if it is random on arrival anyways?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t buy
reviews.comment: Needs more ships and upgrades
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great game. Tons of fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, good memories
reviews.comment: I used to play this years ago on the Palm (Space Trader). One issue is it lags a bit sometimes, and there is no Quit game function. Can the dev look into this please? Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Great game. I wasted many hours playing Space Trader on my multiple Palm devices through the years, and I\'m doing the same here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its alright
reviews.comment: I own this app on my ipod as well. The only complaint I have so far is that the backgrounds make text hard to read sometimes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good concept, bad interface, ugly graphics. Worth it if you like space trader games. Big gripe: the \"ignore\" button is in the same spot as \"surrender\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this game. Love the updates. Dev, you\'re doing a GREAT job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Better than the original and just as fun. Good job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs a quit game option. Good game tho! G2
reviews.author: A Google User
